thread.section_title: Melia Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Courbevoie, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wow
thread.title_full: Wow - Review of Melia Paris La Defense, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: Trekker_Al
title: Wow
text:
Stayed here for our 20 year anniversary so splashed out and stayed on the level floors.
The service was second to none. So helpful.
The view from the room was outstanding and the room set up and design is great.
The hotel is perfect for the metro as it's right outside and the line goes to most of the places you'd want to see as a tourist.
I'd recommend this hotel to anyone.
